# Write a programme to convert uppercase string to lowercase

def uppercase_to_lowercase(string):
    return string.lower()


string = "HII THERE"
print("Input  :", string)
print("Output :", uppercase_to_lowercase(string))


// Write a programme to convert uppercase string to lowercase
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main()
{
  char input[100];
  int i;
  printf("Enter a string : ");
  gets(input);
  for (i = 0; input[i] != '\0'; i++)
  {
    if (input[i] >= 'A' && input[i] <= 'Z')
    {
      input[i] = input[i] + 32;
    }
  }
  printf("\nString in Upper Case : %s\n", input);
  return 0;
}


// Write a programme to convert uppercase string to lowercase
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    string ask;
    cout << "Input  : ";
    getline(cin, ask);
    int store;
    cout << "Output : ";
    for (auto i : ask)
    {
        store = i;
        if (store >= 65 && store <= 90)
            store += 32;
        cout << (char)store;
    }
    cout << endl;
    return 0;
}

// Write a programme to convert uppercase string to lowercase string.
import java.util.Scanner;

public class uppercaseToLowercase {

  public static void main(String[] args) {
    Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
    System.out.print("Input  : ");
    String s = sc.nextLine();

    System.out.println("Output : " + s.toLowerCase());

    sc.close();
  }
}


// Write a programme to convert uppercase string to lowercase

function uppercaseToLower(str){
    return str.toLowerCase();
}

const string = "HII THERE";

console.log("Uppercase string: ", string);
console.log("Lowercase string: ", uppercaseToLower(string));
